summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending pages 116 and 117 of the Official Land Use Map, to rezone property located at 900 South Jackson Street, from Lowrise 3 (L-3) to Neighborhood Commercial 3 with a 65 foot height limit (NC3-65). (Petition of Pacific Rim Center, C.F. 305338, Project Number 2204526.)
